changelog: First Official Beta Release of Aither Download Manager
We are proud to announce the first official beta release of Aither Download Manager, a powerful, modern download solution built for performance, reliability, and flexibility.
Core Features:
Native HTTP/HTTPS/FTP/FTPS Engine — High-performance, multi-connection download engine with parallel segment support for maximum throughput.
Crash-Resistant State Persistence — Robust session recovery system that allows downloads to resume seamlessly after application restart or unexpected crashes.
Torrent Support via aria2c — Integrated BitTorrent support powered by aria2c.
Media Downloads via yt-dlp — Download media from YouTube and 1000+ supported platforms using yt-dlp.
Browser Integration:
Browser Extension Support — Intercept downloads directly from your browser and automatically detect media on any webpage.
In-Page Overlay Button — Hover over any video to instantly send it to Aither without opening a new tab.
One-Click Media Downloads — Download videos, reels, and full playlists from supported social media and video platforms with a single click.
Advanced Capabilities:
Cookie-Based Authentication — Download private, login-protected, and age-restricted content using authenticated session cookies.
Proxy Support & Traffic Controls — Configure proxies, apply per-engine speed limits, and customize connection counts for precise control.
Multi-Language Support — Available in 16 languages.
Beta Notice:
As this is a beta release, bugs, performance inconsistencies, or edge-case failures may occur.
Some workflows may still be optimized in future updates.
User feedback is essential to help stabilize and enhance the platform.
If you find issues, please open a detailed report in the Issues section.
Support Development:
Aither is actively evolving. Contributions, feedback, and community support directly accelerate development and feature delivery.

If you find Aither useful and want to support faster development, consider contributing or donating. Your support helps prioritize improvements, expand platform support, and maintain long-term sustainability.
Thank you for testing and supporting Aither Download Manager.
